Load the discography of K3:

```{r}
df <- K3Reviews::get_reviews()
```

Show the first entries:

```{r}
knitr::kable(head(df))
```

How many reviews?

```{r}
n_reviews <- nrow(df)
```

There are `r n_reviews` reviews.

Here we see the distribution of grades given:

```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot(
  data = df, ggplot2::aes(df$grade)
) + ggplot2::geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)

```
